en-US.name: Spacebot Echo
en-US.summary: Talk to your Spacebot agent from Echo Show.
en-US.description: A private Echo Show bridge that sends voice requests to Spacebot and can render structured visual cards.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Space Bot for my current tasks
Alexa, tell Space Bot to show project status

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Private development skill for personal account usage.
